metaDescription: Logo-only, kinetic, ridiculous—but clean. Hyperactive astronaut energy, zero cringe, professional craft. 3… 2… SEND.

hero.sub: Letters over pictures. Motion over noise. Confidence over cope.

items.p: No buzzwords, no stock photos. Just attitude and type.
Fair on Pump.fun, 0% tax. Press buy or don't. We're sending either way.
Memes move markets. We move memes.

narrativeBurst.title: Boii's Birth
narrativeBurst.body: LEO router sneezed mid-pump. Zero-G coffee hit dopamine packets. A helmet gremlin crawled out of the Wi-Fi and yelled SEND IT. He never stopped.

bullishMenu.title: THE VIBE PANEL
items: LP & fees per Pump.fun docs (currently 0.015 SOL on graduation)
bullishMenu.disclaimer: High risk, high zoomies. Hydrate before takeoff.

community.title: Boii Board
community.body: Post loops with #AstroBoii. Best text-meme gets the homepage spotlight for 24 hours. Letters only. Be loud.

roadmapPreview.title: ZOOMMAP
bullets: Week 3: Zero-G Karaoke — voice channel chaos
